info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 4:19PM EDT until June 18 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
SVRIND
The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a
* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Hancock County in central Indiana... North central Morgan County in central Indiana... Southeastern Hendricks County in central Indiana... Marion County in central Indiana... South central Hamilton County in central Indiana...
* Until 500 PM EDT.
* At 419 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Danville, or 24 miles southwest of Indianapolis, moving northeast at 60 mph.
THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR INDIANAPOLIS, PLAINFIELD, AND SPEEDWAY.
HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely.
* Locations impacted include... Indianapolis, Carmel, Lawrence, Plainfield, Brownsburg, Beech Grove, Speedway, Mooresville, Danville, Avon, Cumberland, Meridian Hills, Warren Park, Clermont, Monrovia, Clayton, Rocky Ripple, Williams Creek, Wynnedale, and Spring Hill.
This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 106 and 124. Interstate 69 near mile marker 200. Interstate 70 between mile markers 57 and 94. Interstate 74 between mile markers 69 and 94.
info.instruction:
Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Indiana.

parameter.value: NWS:DESTRUCTIVE WIND STORM in this area til 500 PM EDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING in effect for this area until 5:00 PM EDT for DESTRUCTIVE 80 mph winds. Take shelter in a sturdy building, away from windows. Flying debris may be deadly to those caught without shelter.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton, IN; Hancock, IN; Hendricks, IN; Marion, IN; Morgan, IN

parameter.value: SNM:TORMENTA DE VIENTO DESTRUCTIVA en esta area hasta 500 PM EDT. Tome refugio ahora

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORMENTA SEVERA en efecto para esta area hasta las 5:00 PM EDT por vientos DESTRUCTIVOS de 80 mph. Tome refugio en un edificio, alejado de las ventanas. Escombros arrastrados por el viento podrian ser mortales para aquellos que se encuentran sin refugio.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton, IN; Hancock, IN; Hendricks, IN; Marion, IN; Morgan, IN
